mapper.sql: ID, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, AMPUTATED, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, NAME, RESPONSIBILITIES
mapper.select:
select
from JOBS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and AMPUTATED = 0
mapper.insert: insert into JOBS (ID, CREATED_DATE_TIME, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, AMPUTATED, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, NAME, RESPONSIBILITIES) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsibilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update JOBS
CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update JOBS set CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMPUTATED = #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESPONSIBILITIES = #{responsibilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT jobs.ID, jobs.CREATED_DATE_TIME, jobs.CREATED_USER_ID, jobs.CREATED_USER_NAME, jobs.AMPUTATED, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, jobs.NAME, jobs.RESPONSIBILITIES FROM JOBS jobs WHERE jobs.AMPUTATED=0
jobs.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'and
ORDER BY jobs.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME DESC

SELECT jobs.ID, jobs.CREATED_DATE_TIME, jobs.CREATED_USER_ID, jobs.CREATED_USER_NAME, jobs.AMPUTATED, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, jobs.NAME, jobs.RESPONSIBILITIES FROM JOBS jobs WHERE jobs.AMPUTATED=0
jobs.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'and
ORDER BY jobs.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME DESC

SELECT jobs.ID, jobs.CREATED_DATE_TIME, jobs.CREATED_USER_ID, jobs.CREATED_USER_NAME, jobs.AMPUTATED, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, jobs.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, jobs.NAME, jobs.RESPONSIBILITIES FROM JOBS jobs where jobs.AMPUTATED=0 and jobs.name= #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY jobs.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME DESC
